name: Diebarians
description:
Our submission for Ludem Dare 45: start with nothing

You play as an Orcish warrior, looking to prove himself and become king of the barbarians. 

Use your time between fights to increase stats, or hunt to get money. Equip trinkets that will aid you in battle, or training. 

COMBAT:

During combat, you will roll dice with the goal of overcoming your opponents Challenge Rating (CR). If you are unable to beat them, then the total gotten from rolling will be subtracted from their CR, and you will loose 1 Hit Point (HP). You can attempt to overcome there CR until your HP runs out

STATS:

STRENGTH: A measure of physical prowess

This stat determines how many d6 will be rolled in combat

for every 2 points in strength, an additional 
die will be added

SKILL: A measure of how well you can use your axe

This stat will determines how many additional dice
can explode after the first

CUNNING:
A mesure of how well you preform in combat

This stat determines how many additional dice
get rolled after rolling a number that explodes

NOTES:

Thank you very much for playing! There were a lot of things that we didn't get around to adding, like music, and in game tutorial, or an endless mode. Each Ludem Dare is a chance to learn, and I'm looking forward to any and all criticism
